name: This Is The Tutorial
description:
Every game HAS a tutorial, but this IS the tutorial. The concept of every tutorial is the same, reach the end and don’t die because who wants to die during the tutorial? Navigate the maze-like Institute and make it to the end. It normally isn’t hard to finish a tutorial but can you find all 4 keys and defeat the Boss?

-          Mange your battery level because your weapon won’t work without a charge

-          Defeat any enemies that stand between you and finished the tutorial

-          Find all 4 keys to open locked doors

-          Reach the Boss and take him out

First Task: Finish the Tutorial
